description: This wonderful 3 BR, 2 bathroom townhouse with well laid out 1403 sq.ft. of comfortable living space is situated in centrally located neighbourhood, close to all amenities and steps to downtown!  Very quiet, small 8-unit complex, this unit is furthest from the road and offers many outstanding features including new windows, a fabulous new kitchen & two updated bathrooms. The unit has its own single car attached garage, a rare bonus! The versatile layout spans 3 levels with good a size bedroom on entry level which would make the perfect family room or office.  Elegant open living room with gas fireplace, inline dining area, updated kitchen & full 4-piece bathroom complete second level.  Third level features large master, another bedroom with balcony plus a full 4-piece bathroom.   Park your car in the garage & walk or bike to Crystal Pool, shopping, parks, cafes and restaurants! Enjoy homeownership at an affordable price!
